item.title: WorldWise - Welcome to the WorldWise DevBlog!
item.description: This is my first post about WorldWise, I am excited to share my journey! What is WorldWise? WorldWise is a mobile application that aims to teach geography using the state of the art technologies of E-Learning. My goal is to give a personalized learning experience to the users, breaking away from traditional learning methods. Why WorldWise? I believe that the existing learning applications are not personalized enough. While they can be engaging, they assume that all users learn in the same way.
